title.rendered: A HOUSS PARTY FIT FOR VIPS AT 5IVE ON THIRTEENTH

content.rendered:
The hottest new spot in Northcliff is officially open! Here’s what our VIPs got up to at the launch of 5ive Restaurant and Bar…

Dressed to kill, beauty bloggers, fashionistas and media rubbed shoulders at the VIP opening of 5ive Restaurant and Bar. This swanky venue is where you’ll find those who live at 5ive on Thirteenth Lifestyle Apartments letting their hair down to enjoy delicious food and entertainment in a flashy setting – the bedazzled pizza oven setting the bar of opulence…

Steven Lee Lewis of X-Factor South Africa fame and the first-ever Motorokr South Africa winner serenaded the VIPs as they sipped on bubbles and dined on an impressive spread of loaded oysters, salt and pepper squid, sushi, gourmet pizzas, and Italian kisses. 

This could be your average Saturday night out, right on your doorstep, when you live at 5ive on Thirteenth!

Want to know more about luxury apartments in Northcliff? Chat to us!
